tool_description: This is API to get data from MyAnimeList and apply it at your web application.
name: MyAnimeList Unofficial
title: MyAnimeList Unofficial

api_list.name: MostFavorite
api_list.description: This endpoint will return Most Favorite Anime List.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://myanimelist-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/most-favorite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "myanimelist-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
